name: LetItHit
description:
There's an outbreak in the system. You have to catch the target before they get a chance to run away. 

How to Play?

Different perspective to an endless-runner game. As a player, you actually play the enemy.

Your goal is simple, just hit the Player. Use your abilities to damage them and score points. Beware of the timer. If you manage to detain the target before the timer runs out you win. That's it!
